descriptors.name: amazon_sidewalk_soc_hello_neighbor
descriptors.label: Amazon Sidewalk - SoC Bluetooth Sub-GHz Hello Neighbor
descriptors.description: The Hello Neighbor sample application leverages the Amazon Sidewalk protocol to connect to the cloud using a either of the 3 radio layer, depending on board and configuration. The application connects to AWS and send or receive messages on button push.

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC Ecosystem|Amazon Project\ Difficulty|Beginner Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth Wireless\ Technology|Sidewalk

descriptors.name: amazon_sidewalk_soc_cli
descriptors.label: Amazon Sidewalk - SoC CLI
descriptors.description: The Bluetooth sub-GHz Command Line Interface (CLI) sample application allows the user to interact with the endpoint using CLI commands. The application leverages the Amazon Sidewalk protocol to exchange data between the endpoint and the AWS Cloud using one of the 3 radio layers.

properties.value: Device\ Type|SoC Ecosystem|Amazon Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth Wireless\ Technology|Sidewalk
